bibl.title: Stucco Heads of Crocodiles. A New Aspect of Crocodile Mummification.
bibl.note: Article based on an examination of the crocodile heads in Trier, in Leiden and in a Belgian private collection. One of the heads in Trier bears a Greek inscription [ed.: Lucia CRISCUOLO, Un'epigrafe augurale su testa di coccodrillo, ibidem, pp. 87-88 et 2 pll.]. Fayum (Crocodilopolis/Arsinoe?), 1st-2nd c. A.D.
bibl.seg: DILS Peter, Stucco Heads of Crocodiles. A New Aspect of Crocodile Mummification.

Article based on an examination of the crocodile heads in Trier, in Leiden and in a Belgian private collection. One of the heads in Trier bears a Greek inscription [ed.: Lucia CRISCUOLO, Un'epigrafe augurale su testa di coccodrillo, ibidem, pp. 87-88 et 2 pll.]. Fayum (Crocodilopolis/Arsinoe?), 1st-2nd c. A.D.
